title: List Difference Based on Function
description: In this lab, you will learn how to find the difference between two lists based on a specific function applied to each element in both lists using Python's built-in `set()` function and list comprehension.

meta.title: Python | List Difference | Function Application | Lab
meta.description: Learn how to find the difference between two lists based on a specific function applied to each element in Python. Enhance your programming skills with this informative tutorial.
meta.keywords: Python, List Difference, Function Application, Programming, Coding
